desc: ElementDriven provides unique aftermarket parts & accessories for your 2003-2011 Honda Element, including DX, EX, EX-P, LX, 4WD, and SC models (YH1/2). Our accessories help you enjoy your vehicle for daily-driver use along with camping, active lifestyle and sports activities; biking, hiking, kayaking, skiing, etc.

layout.text: Providing products to get the most out of your 2003-2011 Honda Element

HELP US TO HELP OTHERS
We set aside $1.50 from each set of our rear-seat latch plates sold to help reduce the 1.5 million people currently diagnosed with diabetes each year.
If you don't have a set of seat latch plates yet, do yourself a favor; save your knees, create more useable floor space and improve the looks of your Element's living and cargo area.
CLICK TO VIEW ALL STYLES AVAILABLE
